gameModel.gameObjects

Class MortalObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameModel.gameObjects.MortalObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObject, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Barrel, NonPlayerCharacter, PlayerCharacter

    public abstract class MortalObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameObject
    Represents a Mortal (alive) object in the game. Mortal objects can attack and can be attack. If attacked and health reaches 0 or lower, the object is considered dead, and should be removed from the game (set to null)
    Author:
    Jiaheng Wang (wangjiah) , Chris Chin (chinchri1)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
